name: Tshipi Borwa Manganese Mine
company_mentions: Tshipi é Ntle Manganese Mining (Pty) Ltd.

verification.notes: Canonical name+slug generated | Canonical name+slug generated | Canonical name+slug generated | Canonical name+slug generated. Web search geocoded. Source: https://www.mining-technology.com/projects/tshipi-mine/. The Tshipi Borwa Manganese Mine is located approximately 20 km south-west of Hotazel in the Kalahari Manganese Field

operators: Tshipi é Ntle Manganese Mining (Pty) Ltd.
web_search_companies.notes: The mine is operated by Tshipi é Ntle Manganese Mining and is jointly owned by Ntsimbintle Holdings (50.1%) and Jupiter Mines (49.9%). OM Holdings has a 13% indirect stake.
